events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving the incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to agent Lisa M. for handling the refund process.
Hello! I'm Lisa, here to help with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed efficiently, may I have the order ID and details about the incorrect item you received?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I received a size medium shirt instead of the large I ordered.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate your refund immediately and provide a prepaid label for the return shipment.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and for handling this smoothly.
Your refund request has been processed and the return label sent to your email. Please ship the item back at your earliest convenience.
Checking in to ensure you received the return label and to confirm if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund process has been successfully initiated and no further assistance was required, this case is now closed.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email to gather your feedback about your recent refund experience.
